# episode-monitor

## Installation

### From PyPI

```console
pipx install episode-monitor
```

### From source

```console
git clone https://github.com/laszloszurok/episode-monitor
cd episode-monitor
python -m build
pipx install dist/episode-monitor-0.0.1-py3-none-any.whl
```
